description: As a technician, I was actively involved in the maintenance and repair responsibilities of machines and tools in the manufacturing process. In addition, I was also given responsibility for a project to create a warehouse capacity monitoring tool for the company's development

As a network technician, I am actively involved in the responsibility of maintaining and repairing all things related to internet connections to maintain user convenience. In addition, I also do development in improving network speed
Make various kinds of posts, either videos or posters when there is a special event to spread important information for the advancement of the foundation
